data.description: The CORSAIR 470T RGB is a distinctive mid-tower ATX case with a spacious interior, striking RGB style, and great cooling. Combining a spacious interior, striking RGB style, and proven CORSAIR build quality, the 470T RGB is a great choice for your new high-performance PC. Offers sharp looks accented by an integrated RGB light strip, with mesh backing for strong intake airflow. Fits up to 7x 120mm or 4x 140mm cooling fans, along with multiple radiators including a 360mm in front or in the roof. Puts your connections within easy reach, including 2x USB 3.0 ports, a microphone jack, an audio jack, and push-button control of your front panel RGB lighting. Show off your high-profile components and RGB lighting.
